str2: For. A primary particle; properly, assigning a reason.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: From stauros; to impale on the cross; figuratively, to extinguish passion or selfishness.

From asthenes; feebleness; by implication, malady; morally, frailty.
But, except, however. Neuter plural of allos; properly, other things, i.e. contrariwise.

str2: To live, be alive. A primary verb; to live.

From dunamai; force; specially, miraculous power.
And, even, also, namely.

str2: I, the first-person pronoun. A primary pronoun of the first person I.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 1st Person Plural
str2: To be weak (physically: then morally), To be sick. From asthenes; to be feeble.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.
